name: GeriCareFinder
tag_list: senior-care, geriatric-care, senior, aging, search, care, health, geriatric, elder, assisted-living, retirement, hospice, alzheimers, alzhimers, dementia, home-care, nursing, nursing-home, senior-care-search
description: Your Single Search for Senior Care
overview: Geri Care Finder is a free, fast and easy guide to Senior Care & health resources. Our comprehensive Senior Care site is the best way to understand and plan for the health and quality senior living for you or your loved one. Use our Elder Care Guide for detailed information about legal and financial planning for seniors, to identify the type of Senior Health Care, or choose the right senior product & service. You can also save your findings in our free online Workspace get help from others! You can create your Free ‘To Do’ list of who you want to contact, and who you want others to research in the Geri Care Finder Online Workspace. At Geri Care Finder you are able to quickly and efficiently find all the care resources you may need when either planning for your own care, or the care of a loved one.
